Flow.description: Screen Flow to navigate user entering a Design Request

formulas.name: frm_ComplexRequestUploadHelpText
formulas.expression: IF({!frm_Portfolio}="International","Ensure all supporting Design files and documents are attached (i.e. Current drawings or visuals, product 3D Shelf Files, design inspirations, competitor and in-market visuals, etc.)","Ensure all supporting Design files and documents are attached (i.e. Current drawings or visuals, design inspirations, competitor and in-market visuals, etc.)")

formulas.name: frm_DrawingDetails
formulas.expression: TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Drawing_Type__c})& IF(TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Drawing_Type__c})="Other", " (" & {!Loop_Drawings.Other_Drawing_Type__c} & ")" , "") & " - " & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Material__c}) & IF(TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Material__c}) = "Other" , " (" & {!Loop_Drawings.Other_Material__c} & ")" , "") & " - " & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Length__c}) & '" x ' & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Width__c}) & '" x ' & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Depth__c}) & '"' & IF({!Loop_Drawings.Pallet_Analysis_Report__c}, " - Pallet (" & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Pallet_Width__c}) & '" x ' & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Pallet_Length__c}) & '" x ' & TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Pallet_Max_Height__c}) & '" - ' & IF(TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Container_Type__c}) = "Other", {!Loop_Drawings.Other_Container_Type__c}, TEXT({!Loop_Drawings.Container_Type__c}) & ")" ), "") &{!frm_LineBreak}&IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Loop_Drawings.Drawing_Notes__c})),"- "&{!Loop_Drawings.Drawing_Notes__c}&{!frm_LineBreak},"")&{!frm_LineBreak}

formulas.description: Add specific verbiage if Graphics is selected
formulas.name: frm_FileUploadLabel
formulas.expression: "Ensure all supporting Design files and documents are attached (i.e. Current drawings or visuals, design inspirations, competitor and in-market visuals, etc.)"&IF({!frm_GraphicsSelected}," Graphics files should be in .ai, or .eps format.","")

formulas.description: Comma-separated list of flow steps for ProgressBar element
formulas.name: frm_FlowSteps

formulas.description: If Opportunity has an existing Workfront #, Design Request is considered return work
formulas.name: frm_IsReturnWork

formulas.description: Assign Portfolio based on Sales Org hierarchy (Level 1 / Level 2) Stephanie Moy (L1) * Darek Lewis (L2) => International * Other => Corporate Ryan Stonebrook (L1) => Domestic Other (L1) => Containers
formulas.name: frm_Portfolio
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_Opp_Owner.name_vp__c}, "MOY, STEPHANIE", IF(OR({!Get_Opp_Owner.name_gsm__c}="SHAW, MAYRA",{!Get_Opp_Owner.name_gsm__c}="LEWIS, DAREK"), "International", "Corporate"), "STONEBROOK, RYAN", "Domestic",CASE({!Get_Opp_Owner.name_gsm__c},"CONSIDINE, GUY","Containers","GAO, FRANCES","International","Other"))

formulas.description: Specialist is not required for Corporate or International requests
formulas.name: frm_SpecialistRequired

Flow.label: Opportunity [SF]: Design Request

loops.name: Update_Drawings_with_Design_Request_ID
loops.label: Update Drawings with Design Request ID

recordUpdates.description: Check the Design checkbox on Opportunity on Design Request submit
recordUpdates.name: Update_Design_on_Opportunity
recordUpdates.label: Update Design on Opportunity

fields.name: VineLink
fields.fieldText: Questions? Read about engaging with Design on Vibe.

fields.name: OppDetailsText
fields.fieldText: First, let's confirm if any updates are needed about the opportunity information:

fields.name: cmp_Sales_Rep_Mobile_Number
fields.helpText: This pulls from your Salesforce settings. To update your mobile phone in Salesforce, click your profile icon in the top right and select Settings > My Personal Information > Personal Information > Mobile

fields.name: cmp_Region_for_Manufacturing
fields.helpText: Please be specific as possible. Format should be “City, Country” or Manufacturer if known.

fields.name: cmp_Region_for_Delivery
fields.helpText: Please be specific as possible. Format should be Region, name of ODM or CM if known.

fields.name: cmp_Delivery_Condition_Explanation
fields.fieldText: If both, please explain the request...

fields.name: VineGuidanceText
fields.fieldText: Please select "Yes" if the Vine team has been engaged to design packaging for this opportunity. Please select "No" if it is unclear if the Vine team will be involved. The Design Network will assist after the opportunity is submitted.

fields.name: SendingSamplesText
fields.fieldText: Before sending any samples or products, wait to hear from your Design PM on where to send.

fields.name: Review_VineServicesUtilized
fields.fieldText: ✅ Vine Services Utilized

fields.name: Review_ManufacturingRegion
fields.fieldText:
Will this be manufactured domestically or internationally?

{!DesignRequest.Manufacturing_Region__c}

fields.name: Review_DesignExecutionRegion
fields.fieldText:
Requested Region to Execute the Design Request

{!DesignRequest.Requested_Design_Execution_Region__c}

fields.name: Review_ShippingBillToZipCode
fields.fieldText:
Zip Code for Bill To on Shipping Account

{!DesignRequest.Shipping_Account_Bill_To_Zip_Code__c}

fields.name: Review_SpecWorkItemQuantity
fields.fieldText:
# of Items to be Spec'd

{!DesignRequest.Spec_Work_Item_Quantity__c}

value.stringValue: Do you need to add another Drawing to the Design Request?

fields.name: cmp_Display_MakeChanges
fields.fieldText: *Note: If you need to make any changes, click the Previous button to go back.

fields.name: cmp_BoardSoakText
fields.fieldText:
Basis Weight is for R&D purposes only; a formal report will NOT be generated, only the suggested Board Grade, a Liner Combo and Flute.


A Board Analysis is more involved; includes Chamber Conditioning Time, Board Soak, and ECT or Burst test. A formal report WILL be generated. If you need a Board Analysis create a Complex Design Request.

fields.name: cmp_BoardSoakWhereToSendNoticeText
fields.fieldText: Before sending samples, wait to hear from Design PM on where to send.

screens.description: Screen to select Complex Request Options and request details
screens.name: scr_Complex_Request
screens.label: Complex Request

fields.name: DrawingWarningText
fields.fieldText: Drawings are needed for Sample Requests. If you do not have a Veritiv Drawing, please select Custom Design and describe what's needed below.

fields.name: cmp_ExistingProjectGuidance
fields.fieldText:
For Production File Requests of completed drawings, select Custom Design and add Drawing File Name below (i.e. ex27397371-00-OVP-02).

For Sample Requests of completed drawings, select Sample and add Drawing File Name below (i.e. ex27397371-00-OVP-02).

fields.name: cmp_DescribeDesignRequestText
fields.fieldText: For your Design Request description, please include design objective, deliverables required, material requirements, details about the product with weights & dimensions. Please include any customer timeline considerations (i.e. product launch dates, etc.)

fields.name: cmp_Display_BoardAnalysisGuidance
fields.fieldText: If Board Analysis is needed, describe your request below and attach pictures of the item to this request.

validationRule.errorMessage: Design Request Description limited to 2,000 characters
Requested completion date must be in the future.

fields.name: cmp_ManufacturingRegion
fields.fieldText: Will this be manufactured domestically or internationally?
fields.helpText: For instance, opportunities through the International Connections promo or utilizing International support should select International. For any opportunities manufactured domestically, leave as Domestic.

fields.name: cmp_Requested_Design_Execution_Region
fields.fieldText: Requested Region to Execute the Design Request
fields.helpText: Select your requested Region to execute the Design Request. Design Team will determine final location and resources for request based on best fit and resource capacity.

fields.name: cmp_TestingDisplayText
fields.fieldText: For requests involving Testing, please download, complete to the best of your ability, and attach the Testing Request Form (Click Here) below. Contact Regional Testing PM with any Questions.

value.stringValue: Ensure all supporting Design files and documents are attached (i.e. Current drawings or visuals, product 3D Shelf Files, design inspirations, competitor and in-market visuals, etc.) Graphics files should be in .ai, or .eps format.
What do you need to do?

fields.name: cmp_ProductionFileDrawingName
fields.fieldText: Please provide the Drawing File Name (e.g. ex27397371-00-OVP-02) below:

fields.name: cmp_Other_Drawing_Type
fields.helpText: See full list of FEFCO Codes.

fields.name: FEFCOCodes
fields.fieldText: See full list of FEFCO Codes.

fields.name: cmp_Drawing_Notes
fields.fieldText: Additional Drawing Details (can include manufacturer joint notes, hand holes, etc.)

value.stringValue: Graphics files should be in .ai or .eps format.

fields.name: cmp_Quantity_of_Samples
fields.helpText: If you need more than 3 samples, select 3 and reach out to your specialist.

fields.name: cmp_SampleProcedureText
fields.fieldText: Standard Sample Procedure is for samples to be shipped Knocked Down and Glued with Pre-broken scores. If different condition is needed describe it below in Additional Notes on Samples.

fields.name: cmp_Display_ReturnWorkSamples
fields.fieldText: For Sample Requests of completed drawings, please provide the Drawing File Name below (e.g. ex27397371-00-OVP-02):

fields.name: cmp_DesignCenterPickupInstructions
fields.fieldText: Please indicate in the Additional Notes on Samples field the Design Center you'd like to pickup samples from.

fields.name: cmp_Zip_Code_of_Shipping_Account_Bill_To
fields.fieldText: Zip Code of Shipping Account Bill To

fields.name: cmp_Sample_Destination
fields.fieldText: Use Ship To or Manual Input Address

fields.name: SamplesWarning
fields.fieldText: Drawings are needed for Sample Requests. If you do not have a Veritiv Drawing, please select Drawings and fill in the prompts.

validationRule.errorMessage: Requested completion date must be in the future.

fields.name: CorporateAccountsReminder
fields.fieldText: For Corporate accounts, selecting a Specialist is optional.

fields.name: SpecialistMapLink
fields.fieldText: Not sure which Specialist to select? Click here for a map to find out who supports your territory.

fields.name: cmp_Spec_Work_Type
fields.fieldText: Are you spec'ing Drawings or Physical Samples?

fields.name: cmp_Spec_Work_Description
fields.fieldText: Describe the item to be spec'd

fields.name: cmp_Display_SampleWarning
fields.fieldText: Before sending samples, wait to hear from Design PM on where to send.

screens.name: Stage_3_Develop_Solution_or_Later_Required
screens.label: Stage 3 - Develop Solution or Later Required

fields.name: Stage3OrLaterRequiredText
fields.fieldText: Stage 3 or Later Required to be able to submit a Design Request.

textTemplates.name: NotificationBody
textTemplates.text: {!Get_Account.Name} - {!Get_Opportunity.Name}: A {!var_Type} Design Request in the {!frm_Portfolio} portfolio requires your review.

textTemplates.name: NotificationTitle
textTemplates.text: ✅ Design Request submitted for your review.
